name: Only TWOS Are Allowed
description:
The game is made for United Game Jam 2020

Only TWOS Are Allowed is a simple minimalistic math puzzle where you need to be equal to TWO to win

Controls:

A/D or arrows - movement

Space - jump

R - restart level

Credits

Tape1 - programming and design

phil.guz - music and sound design

Press Start 2P font made by CodeMan38 (GPL license)
